She heard the message oveer her link. "Yeah I hear you. Come on=
 in 
and we can talk. Just home in on the signal from my transmission.I'm 
=
at the ARK. Also, if you can bring anything from pod, do so. We will 
need =
it."

She walked over to the bridge and looked at the scematics of the 
shi=
p.  She shook her head.  It would take a miracle to keep this ship 
from fa=
lling apart.
